articles.title: NATO allies say Hegseth "missing a good party" as they meet, adjust to slimmed down U.S. role under Trump - CBS News
articles.description: America's NATO allies say they're not disappointed by top Trump administration officials skipping summits, as they ramp up their own regional defenses.
articles.content: Brussels — European allies at NATO on Thursday brushed aside concerns that the United States has stepped back from its leadership role of the world's biggest security organization, leaving them and C… [+7187 chars]
